actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend section 3146 of title 18, United States Code, relating to bail, to require judicial officers who release individuals charged with drug offenses to require an appearance equal to the street value of the drugs seized.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to require that the amount of bail set for any person charged with narcotics offenses punishable by ten or more years of imprisonment be at least equal to the street value of the drugs seized.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 3146 of title 18, United States Code, relating to bail, to require judicial officers who release individuals charged with drug offenses to require an appearance equal to the street value of the drugs seized.
